message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $13,000.  I think it will greatly benefit you and it's a fantastic deal.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly above that. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $10,200? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my means.
